org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.AbstractNode
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultFontContainer, HasFont, IsDefaultAction, IsDefaultContentElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionItem

    public class Action
extends AbstractNode
implements IsDefaultAction
    Configures style of the toast actions.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      Sets the border color.
      void setBorderColor(String borderColor)
      Sets the border color.
      void setBorderRadius(int borderRadius)
      Sets the border radius (in pixels) of toast action.
      void setBorderStyle(BorderStyle... style)
      Sets the border styles set for the action element.
      This property can have from one to four values.
      Examples:
      setBorderStyle(BorderStyle.DOTTED, BorderStyle.SOLID, BorderStyle.DOUBLE, BorderStyle.DASHED);
           top border is dotted
           right border is solid
           bottom border is double
           left border is dashed
      setBorderStyle(BorderStyle.DOTTED, BorderStyle.SOLID, BorderStyle.DOUBLE);
           top border is dotted
           right and left borders are solid
           bottom border is double
      setBorderStyle(BorderStyle.DOTTED, BorderStyle.SOLID);
           top and bottom borders are dotted
           right and left borders are solid
      setBorderStyle(BorderStyle.DOTTED);
           all four borders are dotted
      void setBorderStyle(List<BorderStyle> style)
      Sets the border styles set for the action element.
      This property can have from one to four values.
      Examples:
      setBorderStyle(Arrays.asList(BorderStyle.DOTTED, BorderStyle.SOLID, BorderStyle.DOUBLE, BorderStyle.DASHED));
           top border is dotted
           right border is solid
           bottom border is double
           left border is dashed
      setBorderStyle(Arrays.asList(BorderStyle.DOTTED, BorderStyle.SOLID, BorderStyle.DOUBLE));
           top border is dotted
           right and left borders are solid
           bottom border is double
      setBorderStyle(Arrays.asList(BorderStyle.DOTTED, BorderStyle.SOLID));
           top and bottom borders are dotted
           right and left borders are solid
      setBorderStyle(Arrays.asList(BorderStyle.DOTTED));
           all four borders are dotted
      void setBorderWidth(int borderWidth)
      Sets the border width.

      • setBorderStyle

        public final void setBorderStyle(BorderStyle... style)
        Sets the border styles set for the action element.
        This property can have from one to four values.
        Examples:
        • setBorderStyle(BorderStyle.DOTTED, BorderStyle.SOLID, BorderStyle.DOUBLE, BorderStyle.DASHED);
               top border is dotted
               right border is solid
               bottom border is double
               left border is dashed
        • setBorderStyle(BorderStyle.DOTTED, BorderStyle.SOLID, BorderStyle.DOUBLE);
               top border is dotted
               right and left borders are solid
               bottom border is double
        • setBorderStyle(BorderStyle.DOTTED, BorderStyle.SOLID);
               top and bottom borders are dotted
               right and left borders are solid
        • setBorderStyle(BorderStyle.DOTTED);
               all four borders are dotted
        Parameters:
        style - the border styles set for the action element.
        This property can have from one to four values.
